select count(*) from board where bd_valid = 'I' and bd_type = #{bd_type}

insert into board(bd_title, bd_contents, bd_me_id, bd_type, bd_pw, bd_answer) values(#{bd_title}, #{bd_contents}, #{bd_me_id}, #{bd_type}, #{bd_pw}, #{bd_answer})
